I am requesting to withdraw my membership. Withdrawal will be completed in <color=red>30 days</color>,  
and you can log in during this processing period to cancel the withdrawal.  
  
Once membership withdrawal is complete, all game data will be deleted,  
<color=red>and recovery is impossible.</color>  
  
To request membership withdrawal, please enter the sentence below.
I agree to delete my account.
To change the language, you need to restart the game. Would you like to restart?
